message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000.  It's a great deal for both of us.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to save as much money as I can.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $9,250 is my final offer.  This price is still fair for both of us, and allows you to get a great product at a good value.

I'm not sure $9,250 is a good deal for me, considering the product's worth is only $8,000 to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9,000. Let's see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
